sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react";
// import SForm from "../Images/sForm.png";
import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button";
import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal";
import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form";
import "./Assest/Style.css";
import emailjs from "emailjs-com";
import { useRef } from "react";

function StudentForm() {
  const [show, setShow] = useState(false);

  const handleClose = () => setShow(false);
  const handleShow = () => setShow(true);
  const form = useRef();

  const sendEmail = (e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    setShow(false);
    emailjs
      .sendForm(
        "service_rg2ccjr",
        "template_s4iyu0q",
        form.current,
        "fBEfYG7Lpo7Dicn6G"
      )
      .then(
        (result) => {
          console.log(result.text);
        },
        (error) => {
          console.log(error.text);
        }
      );
  };

  return (
    <>
      <Button
        variant="light"
        className="item2 view-more rounded-pill me-5"
        onClick={handleShow}
      >
        Register
      </Button>

      <Modal show={show} onHide={handleClose} className="modal">
        <Modal.Title className="heading">
          <Modal.Header closeButton className="heading">
            Registration Form
          </Modal.Header>
        </Modal.Title>
        <Modal.Body className="mBody">
          <Form className="sForm" ref={form} onSubmit={sendEmail}>
            <Form.Group className="mb-2" controlid="formBasicName">
              <Form.Control
                type="text"
                name="name"
                placeholder="Enter Name"
                required
                className="input-form rounded-pill"
              />
            </Form.Group>
            <Form.Group className="mb-2" controlid="formBasicEmail">
              <Form.Control
                type="email"
                name="email"
                placeholder="Enter email"
                required
                className="input-form rounded-pill"
              />
            </Form.Group>
            <Form.Group className="mb-2" controlid="formBasicNumber">
              <Form.Control
                type="number"
                name="phone"
                placeholder="PhoneNumber"
                required
                className="input-form rounded-pill"
              />
            </Form.Group>

            <Form.Group className="mb-2" controlid="formBasicDegree">
              <Form.Control
                type="text"
                name="degree"
                placeholder="Degree"
                required
                className="input-form rounded-pill"
              />
            </Form.Group>
            <Form.Group className="mb-2" controlid="formBasicDegree">
              <Form.Control
                type="number"
                name="year"
                placeholder="Year of Studying"
                min="1990"
                max="2022"
                required
                className="input-form rounded-pill"
              />
              <Form.Group controlId="formFile" className="mt-3">
                <Form.Label className="upload-label">
                  Upload Your ID Card Image
                </Form.Label>
                <Form.Control
                  type="file"
                  name="image"
                  className="rounded-pill"
                />
              </Form.Group>
            </Form.Group>
            <Form.Group className="btn-grp">
              <Button
                type="submit"
                className="close mt-3 butn submit-btn rounded-pill"
                onClick={handleClose}
              >
                Submit
              </Button>
            </Form.Group>
          </Form>
        </Modal.Body>
      </Modal>
    </>
  );
}

export default StudentForm;
